cause.description:
Serious issues must be delt with..........................
and this is not one of them.
1. People didn't hire Linnea or I because we were blonde.
2. Everyone makes dumb blonde jokes even though I'm blonde and I skipped a grade and all the blondes I know do well in school.
3. Blonde people need to be exploited as the smart people they are.
cause.mission: Keep people from being racist to blondes.
cause.name: People Against Racism Towards Blondes
